WebLink.description: Projected Dates are calculated in order of Project Priority for all Projects whose Record Type and Team is selected from visualforce page, that have at least one related Task, and have a Status of either “Backlog Item” or “In Progress”. The projected dates utilize each Sprint’s “Daily Velocity” to determine how many project hours can be completed on a daily basis (based on work days only). The “project hours” for each Project is the “Project-Level LOE (hrs)” if the Status is “Backlog Item”, or the “Remaining LOE (Project)” if the Status is “In Progress”.
